allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Remove hardcoded OpenAI API key and use environment variable

- Moved OpenAI API key to environment variable for security
- Added .env.example file as template
- Added warning if OPENAI_API_KEY is not set

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add questionnaire feature with OpenAI integration

- Created 5-question health questionnaire (Russian)
- Integrated OpenAI API for health risk assessment
- Added SQLite database for storing responses
- Used environment variables for API keys (security best practice)
- Added .env.example template

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
